lead_paragraph: Lasith Malinga has stepped down as Sri Lanka captain ahead of their World Twenty20 title defence in India, the secretary of the country's cricket board told Reuters on Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: Malinga Steps Down as Lanka Captain for World T20
headline.main: Malinga Steps Down as Lanka Captain for World T20
